Package com.eclipsesource.tabris.widgets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientDialogListener
    A ClientDialogListener can be added to a ClientDialog to get notification regarding the life cycle of a dialog.
    ClientDrawListener
    A ClientDrawListener will be called when a client draws on a ClientCanvas.
    LoadListener
    A LoadListener is usually added to the PdfView widget to get notification about loading of the PDF document.
    PlaybackListener
    A PlaybackListener can be added to a Video object to receive video events.
    RefreshListener
    A RefreshListener can be added to a RefreshComposite or a RefreshHandler.
    ScanListener
    A ScanListener is usually added to the BarcodeScanner widget to get notification about the scan results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarcodeScanner
    The BarcodeScanner widget can be used to to scan various types of barcodes.
    ClientCanvas
    Provisional API, may change in future versions.
    ClientDialog
    A ClientDialog is a client side dialog.
    ClientDialogAdapter
    This adapter provides an empty default implementation of ClientDialogListener.
    ImageView
    A widget to display an image.
    PagingIndicator
    When you build your app with a paging concept using Swipe, TabrisUI or any homebrew solution itâ€™s sometimes required that you need to indicate the paging progress.
    PdfView
    A widget to display a PDF document.
    RefreshComposite
    A RefreshComposite works like an ordinary Composite with the exception that it adds native refresh behavior.
    ScanAdapter
    This adapter provides an empty default implementation of ScanListener.
    ScrollingComposite
    A ScrollingComposite can be used the same way as a simple Composite.
    Video
    A Video can be used to play videos from an URL on a mobile device.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BarcodeScanner.Formats  
    BarcodeScanner.ScaleMode
    How to scale the camera frame inside the bounds of the BarcodeScanner.
    ClientDialog.ButtonType
    A client dialog can have three buttons.
    ImageView.ScaleMode  
    Video.PlayerState
    The current playback state of the video player.
